Title: (viii) Peri-prosthetic fractures of the hip: A new approach
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd.As the numbers of primary total hip arthroplasty increase there will be more complex peri-prosthetic fractures. The management and prognosis of such fractures is fast evolving. A new classification and approach to management of these fractures is discussed.
